idea-plugin.name: Base16 pinky
idea-plugin.vendor: Benjamin (https://github.com/b3nj5m1n), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 pinky for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Benjamin (https://github.com/b3nj5m1n). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
